Package com.bakdata.dedupe.similarity

Interface CollectionSimilarityMeasure<C extends java.util.Collection<? extends E>,​E>

  • Type Parameters:
    E - the element type.
    C - the collection type.
    All Superinterfaces:
    SimilarityMeasure<C>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    SetSimilarityMeasure<C,​E>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CosineSimilarityMeasure, MatchingSimilarity
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
    @FunctionalInterface
public interface CollectionSimilarityMeasure<C extends java.util.Collection<? extends E>,​E>
extends SimilarityMeasure<C>
    A SimilarityMeasure that is defined over Collections.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods

      double calculateNonEmptyCollectionSimilarity​(C leftCollection, C rightCollection, @NonNull SimilarityContext context)
      Calculates the similarity ignoring the trivial cases of empty input collections.
      default double getNonNullSimilarity​(C leftCollection, C rightCollection, @NonNull SimilarityContext context)
      Calculates the similarity of the left and right value.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.bakdata.dedupe.similarity.SimilarityMeasure

        binarize, cutoff, getSimilarity, isSymmetric, negate, of, of, scaleWithThreshold, unknownIf, unknownIfZero

    • Method Detail

      • getNonNullSimilarity

        default double getNonNullSimilarity​(@NonNull
                                    C leftCollection,
                                    @NonNull
                                    C rightCollection,
                                    @NonNull
                                    @NonNull SimilarityContext context)
        Description copied from interface: SimilarityMeasure
        Calculates the similarity of the left and right value.

        Note that some similarities are non-commutative, so that the order of the parameters matters.

        Specified by:
        getNonNullSimilarity in interface SimilarityMeasure<C extends java.util.Collection<? extends E>>
        Parameters:
        leftCollection - the left element for which the similarity should be calculated.
        rightCollection - the right element for which the similarity should be calculated.
        context - the context of the comparison.
        Returns:
        the similarity [0; 1] or SimilarityMeasure.unknown() if no comparison can be performed (for example if left or right are null).

      • calculateNonEmptyCollectionSimilarity

        double calculateNonEmptyCollectionSimilarity​(@NonNull
                                             C leftCollection,
                                             @NonNull
                                             C rightCollection,
                                             @NonNull
                                             @NonNull SimilarityContext context)
        Calculates the similarity ignoring the trivial cases of empty input collections.
        Parameters:
        leftCollection - the non-empty, leftCollection element for which the similarity should be calculated.
        rightCollection - the non-empty, rightCollection element for which the similarity should be calculated.
        context - the context of the comparison.
        Returns:
        the similarity [0; 1] or SimilarityMeasure.unknown() if no comparison can be performed (for example if leftCollection or rightCollection are null).
